name: Knights of Treasure
description:
A brave band of heroes sought to reclaim the treasure that was stolen from them. Have fun in this challenging, top-down, turn based, strategy game. Fight enemies and slay the dragon in a dark dungeon. Made for the Below the Stone game jam.

Code stuffs by Me (Gabe#3942)

Art/Music by Morgan (SirMilkman#5159)

Sound Effects by Noah (Shuttle_Paint_Red#1289)
